page.title: 09EDUCATION IN CROSSGATES
page.content: In{1925}Crossgates High School was opened,but later become a Primary School.There was a second school in Mossgreen and one in Halbeath,But in{ {1968}they both closed and pupils went to Crossgates Primary.At one point the number of pupils in the school was close to the{300}mark ,but this number has dropped to{ 180.}Education wasn't very good,with large classes and not many facilities. Nowadays the facilities in the school have improved a lot.They have 3 computers,a language unit for children who can't express themselves,a nursery, school doctors ,nurses ,dentists,etc.The school is quite large and is hidden behind houses on the main road.Education has improved with smaller classes and more individual teaching.
